name: Gallery Mementos: 1K Posts
description:
After months in closed testing, we have crossed 1,000 posts on Gallery and have opened Posts to the public in Open Beta.

This release marks the evolution of Gallery into a full social app built to share art. A special thank you to our early users and testers.

Learn more about it in our latest [blog post](https://gallery.mirror.xyz/HNEYLQJ6vtTYqqotGjZG7pFFn8IE71_rbZkCU0R-MSk).
